mapper.select: select TABLE_NAME, TABLE_COMMENT, CREATE_TIME from information_schema.TABLES where TABLE_SCHEMA = (select database()) and TABLE_NAME not like 'generator_%' and TABLE_NAME = #{tableName}

select it.TABLE_NAME, it.TABLE_COMMENT, it.CREATE_TIME, gt.class_name, gt.update_time, gt.generator_type from information_schema.TABLES it left join generator_table gt on it.TABLE_NAME = gt.table_name where it.TABLE_SCHEMA = (select database()) and it.TABLE_NAME not like 'generator_%'
and (it.TABLE_NAME like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or it.TABLE_COMMENT like concat('%',#{keyword},'%'))
order by it.CREATE_TIME desc
